In this context; attention is drawn towards Policy Circular No.11041/217/2007-Admn: dated 30.07.2009 whereby all PIUs, divisions, CMUs and all officers at HQ were directed that legal opinions/advice must not be sought directly from the Law Firms/Advocates but only through the Legal & Arbn: Cell; Inspite of clear-cut instructions in the above said circulars, it has been observed that some of the PIUs/CMUs have obtained expert legal opinion directly from the Law Firm/Counsel which has created confusion due to equivocal views. 3 Keeping in view the poor quality of legal opinion tendered by some of the Law Firms/Advocates, it has been decided by Competent Authority that henceforth, legal opinion must only be obtained from or through the Legal & Arbn: Cell for which all queries and issues which are of complex nature are to be clearly brought; out upon which the opinion is intended to be sought; The Legal Cell would also be able to check whether similar opinion has keen sought earlier. 4 The opinion on routine and general mattes must be avoided specifically.
